entry.title: Model Thinking on coursera
entry.content:
Though I always delay on the quiz test date. But I still finish the third quizs.

Before this course, I only finished one mooc course.

It is about Chinese history, and taught by Chinese.

And I will do my best to insist on this course. And learn more moocs in this year.

entry.title: Notes 1 of Model Thinking -Universoty of Michigan
entry.content:
I join this lecture.

And listen some video courses.

And make some notes.

Advantages of Model:

  1. Intelligent Citizon of the World
  2. Clearer thinker
  3. Use and Understand data
  4. Decide, Strategize and Design

Some words

anthropology 人类学 zoology 动物学 logical incosistencies 逻辑矛盾 crutch 拐杖

entry.title: Some MOOC Website
entry.content:
MOOC List-几大MOOC列表

Coursera

Edx

Udacity

华语圈内MOOC-In Chinese

学堂在线 -清华大学

Ewant -新竹交通大学，以及西南、西安、上海、北京交通大学

Others

Stanford

Canvas

Novoed –斯坦福-经济方面

FutureLearn -英国几所大学

Open2Study -澳洲

Iversity -德国

其他-可能不算MOOC

主要是 编程、计算机方面：

Codecademy

KhanCademy

总结

以前不知道有这么多MOOC提供者，最早知道得是Stanford Online，然后知道了Mitx(现在和并到edx中)。

总之，以后发现一些新的MOOC课程提供网站，还会在本页更新。

尽情享受知识吧。
